name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 24, a Hebei netizen reported that he received a text message from the Hebei Medical Insurance Bureau urging him to pay his medical insurance. The text message said that he should register for insurance and pay the premiums in time. If he did not register for insurance and pay the premiums during the concentrated payment period, he would not be able to enjoy medical insurance benefits in time after he became ill in 2025.
The netizen said, "I was still hesitant about whether to pay or not, but after seeing this text message with an imperative tone, I completely didn't want to pay, as if I owed you 400 yuan."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 24, Jiangxi. The delivery of the Jiuyuefu real estate project in Fuzhou was delayed, and the owners protested their rights in front of the government building. A large number of people were present to maintain stability.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 23, Weihai Municipal Third Hospital, Shandong Province
A boy suddenly convulsed after receiving an IV in the hospital and died. The director of the hospital once said: "The compensation is only 200,000 yuan, the child's life is worthless."
A large number of people gathered in dissatisfaction, and the police later cleared the scene and blocked the surrounding areas. There are still a few entries in the Douyin search for "Weihai Hospital", but most of them have been deleted
Informed netizens said: The injected drugs are collectively purchased generic drugs, with many impurities and poor quality, which can easily lead to death from allergic shock

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Participating in medical insurance according to law is the right and obligation of every citizen ——Hebei Medical Insurance Administration emphasizes
The entry on Baidu Encyclopedia explains "obligation":
Obligation is legally mandatory.
Obligation is the symmetry of "rights". The law restricts citizens or legal persons to make or prohibit certain behaviors. In a socialist society, obligations and rights are consistent and inseparable. The responsibilities that citizens or legal persons should fulfill according to the law, such as military service.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 24 Huizhou Guanghong Technology
A student worker who was doing internship at the factory posted a post complaining: I wanted to leave early on the 19th, but the foreman refused to sign the resignation form. After the resignation form was signed on the 24th, I was told that I had to follow the resignation process as a regular employee and could only leave one month after signing (it happened to be winter vacation at that time), and I would not get paid for the 20 days before leaving in January. If I leave without working, my December salary will be deducted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 22, Xi County, Xinyang, Henan Province organized the masses to engage in a "human-grass war". In the process of promoting the improvement of the human settlement environment, it was required that the stubble of wild trees and weeds on both sides of the main roads such as national roads, provincial roads, and county roads be left at about 10 cm.
They also painted white walls and added green tiles to 12 houses along the road in a village, but no renovations were made to the rest of the houses in the village
Nine people including the deputy mayor and the county party secretary were given a serious warning within the party, and no further punishment or dismissal was given.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Huainan, Anhui, four special police officers stood guard at the school gate with rifles, and at least two staff members were filming with gimbals.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 24, Yang Maoyue's account was banned and became a hot search on Weibo. Yang Maoyue had posted a video mocking post-2000 college students who could not find jobs. After this incident, his Douyin account quickly lost followers. As of now, the number of followers lost is as high as nearly 1.3 million.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 21st, Zhengzhou, Henan, Yuexiu Jinyue Wenhua, owners gathered to protest against forced delivery of houses, and the houses had serious quality problems
December 23rd, Zhengzhou, Henan, unfinished Xinzheng City Kangqiao Nayunxi, owners gathered in front of the petition center to demand "serve the people" and solve the unfinished problems
December 23rd, Yulin, Shaanxi, Shenmu Chengtou Phoenix City, owners crowded the sales office to defend their rights and developers to reduce prices

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 19, Wuhan, Hubei, Wuhan Wanlong Plaza closed down, the mall was deserted, owners gathered to block the door, banged bowls and pots, and used loud speakers to play slogans to protect their rights, demanding the mall: "Give me back my hard-earned money"
The video shows several police cars arriving at the scene

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 23, Wenzhou Rentian Village villagers gathered to defend their rights due to the quality of resettlement housing
Villagers said: When building resettlement housing, the government forcibly expropriated land and forcibly removed the wheat that was about to mature to build houses. Although they were allocated resettlement quota compensation, they still paid a lot of housing construction fees
The village committee forced villagers to pay the balance when the resettlement housing did not pass the housing quality inspection. Before the distribution of houses began, many cracks appeared in the houses, and the steel bars were exposed and broken

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 16th, Pucheng County, Weinan, Shaanxi, workers held up a black banner with white letters to block the entrance of the Party and Mass Activity Center, demanding their hard-earned money from Huatong Road Bridge Company
December 20th, Puyang, Henan, Guangzhou Second Construction Engineering Company Global Digital Technology City Project, workers gathered at the door, writing red letters on their clothes to demand their wages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 21st Huaiji County, Zhaoqing, Guangdong: Farmers protested against the government's demolition of their homesteads without the consent of the owners. The police had a fierce argument with the villagers at the scene, and some villagers were forcibly taken into a car and taken away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 24, the houses of residents in Songhe Community, Macheng, Huanggang, Hubei were forcibly demolished due to the construction of the Yangtze River High-speed Railway.
A large number of suspected police officers with shields and forks were dispatched to the scene, and a staff member forcibly pushed down the aunt who stayed at the scene. In the video, the sound of suspected fists hitting flesh can be heard. The aunt was also crying and shouting that the staff had beaten her. Then the staff forcibly dragged the aunt away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 23, villagers in Xushui Village, Zhengzhou, Henan Province, gathered to defend their rights and demand transitional fees for house demolition and resettlement. The transitional fees were only 200 to 300 yuan per month, but they still could not be paid.
In the comment area, some netizens said: Zhengzhou Erqi District has owed transitional fees for nearly 5 years. Other places have also generally owed transitional fees for three or four years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens in the comment section also said that the transition period was originally 18 months, but the resettlement housing has not been built in the past two years. Some netizens also said that the house has not been built even after seven or eight years of demolition.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 23, the owners of Zhongjun World City in Rizhao, Shandong Province, gathered in front of the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China to defend their rights and demanded that the bank "return my hard-earned money". It is suspected that because the project was left unfinished, the bank illegally released the money in the supervision account to the developer in advance, causing the developer to run away with the money. The owners lost both their money and their houses, and were also burdened with mortgage debts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 23, Shanxi Linfen Zhuangyuan Mansion Owners accused the developer of false advertising and put up banners to protect their rights. The banners were snatched away by the property security guards, who insulted and pushed the owners, and a physical conflict broke out on the scene.
